name: Teddy DAO
shortDescription: Teddy DAO is an NFT project created specifically for charity so that others can "do good"
description: Teddy DAO is an NFT project that mints one digital collectible per day. Potential donors can place a bid and choose a specific charity in our partner's network. If that donor is the winning bidder, he or she will win the NFT and nearly 100% of the funds go to that specific charity.
